'''Talfor''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

{{Description|A tall, wiry man blocks your path. He wears a sly smile as one might wear their most comfortable trousers.}}
Talfor is a captain of the Principi currently preparing a trap for Captain [Avetta](/avetta/) of the VTC. [Degnos](/degnos/) is a crucial part of his plans and he does not appreciate interference.

## Interactions

{{Interactions
|companion       =
|wares           =
|stronghold      =
|rest            =
|quests_started  =
|quests_involved =[Sealed Fate](/sealedFate/)
|none            = 
|other           =
}}

## =Quests

=
* [Sealed Fate](/sealedFate/) - Talfor will waylay you after picking up [Degnos' satchel](/degnosSatchel/).

##  Trivia 

The character portrait for Talfor bears a striking resemblance to [Josh Sawyer](/joshSawyer/), the Game Director of ''[Pillars of Eternity II: Deadfire](/pillarsOfEternityIiDeadfire/).''<ref>https://twitter.com/jesawyer/status/994717527614799872</ref>

{{Reflist}}
